definition: net-like object/to hold sth in place with a net/to wind/to twist/(TCM) channels in the human body

sentences.english: We get acquainted with each other soon.
Yes, I know her very well. She was my girl friend during my first year in university.
sentences.chinese: 是，我跟她很熟絡，她是我大學一年級時的女友。

sentences.english: I've actually become quite friendly with her.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，我們很快便開始熟絡和友好起來。

sentences.english: Don't assume familiarity with the reader.
sentences.chinese: 不要假設你跟讀者很熟絡。
